home.name: Marc Santisteban Ruiz
home.description:
Fullstack developer, I am currently working in Arteco Consulting and I have almost a year of experience in this company.
year of experience in this company, I have more than 4 years of experience programming individually.
individually, I have worked with several technologies but the one I work with the most is with
Java and React.js. Able to work in a team or independently, depending on the needs, willing to learn and
I am eager to learn and eager to improve.

I am currently attending a bootcamp of fullstack mobile, because at the end I would like to evolve towards a fullstack mobile profile.
evolve towards a profile of fullstack mobile (IOS / Android), with knowledge in React
Native, Flutter, Swift and Kotlin.

For more information feel free to visit my website, where I upload my personal projects (along with its Github), my knowledge, etc.

degree.title: High School Diploma with a Science Emphasis
degree.description: I studied at IES S'Arenal where I took the scientific baccalaureate. During my time there, I developed solid skills in JavaScript, Java, MySQL, CSS and HTML. I acquired these competencies through internships, exams and assignments that challenged my understanding and skills in programming and web design. These experiences enriched my education and prepared me to face the challenges of the technological world with confidence and skill.

degree.title: Associate Degree of Development of Multiplatform Applications
degree.description: I studied at CIFP Pau Casesnoves the Higher Degree in Multiplatform Application Development, where I acquired skills in Flutter, Linux, Git and GitHub, Dart, MongoDB and Java. I developed these skills through internships, exams and projects, where I obtained a final average of 9.7. Thanks to this training, I feel able to face challenges in the world of software development with solidity and confidence.

degree.title: Full Stack Mobile App Development Bootcamp
degree.description: KeepCoding's Full Stack Mobile Bootcamp provides a complete mastery of the main components and architectures of the mobile stack, training at an advanced level in native Swift, native Kotlin, React Native and Flutter.

data.title: Full Stack Developer
data.description: At Arteco Consulting SL, I worked developing frontend and backend code for Melia Internationals, a hotel company.

data.title: Full Stack Web and Mobile Developer
data.description:
In this company I have worked as a fullstack web and mobile developer, that is, I have worked with frontend technologies as now ReactJS and Thymeleaft, I have worked with backend technologies as now SpringBoot and Spring Gateway, and I have worked with mobile technologies as now Flutter, where I have made the architecture of a whole project, I have designed the screens with UI/UX techniques and where I am familiar with Block.

On the other hand I have worked with Jira, Bitbucket and Jenkins and sometimes I have had to configure it, I have worked with Docker (using it and creating it), in terms of architecture I have worked with hexagonal architecture and in backend we have always worked with TDD.
